query: UPDATE settings SET price_value = 0.75 WHERE setting_key = 'price_10x15'; UPDATE settings SET price_value = 2.20 WHERE setting_key = 'price_15x21'; SELECT setting_key, price_value FROM settings WHERE setting_key LIKE 'price_%';
